bridge-type.label: MAX! Cube LAN gateway
bridge-type.description: This bridge represents the MAX!Cube LAN gateway.

parameter.name: ipAddress
parameter.label: MAX! Cube LAN gateway IP
parameter.description: The IP address of the MAX! Cube LAN gateway

parameter.name: refreshInterval
parameter.label: Refresh Interval
parameter.description: The refresh interval in ms which is used to poll given MAX! Cube.

parameter.name: serialNumber
parameter.label: Serial Number
parameter.description: The Serial Number identifies one specific device.

parameter.name: exclusive
parameter.label: Exclusive Mode
parameter.description: If set to true, the binding will leave the connection to the Cube open.

parameter.name: maxRequestsPerConnection
parameter.label: Max Requests per Connection
parameter.description: In exclusive mode, how many requests are allowed until connection is closed and reopened.
